DOC.brief_summary: To determine alter expression gene know PAI-1 may affect adhesive capacity cell play critical role developement human atherosclerosis .
DOC.detailed_description: The principal aim study determine molecular regulation human gene PAI-1 alters migratory property human myeloid endothelial cell sufficiently enough regulate entry exit vascular space . Human monocyte become key cellular orchestrator human atherosclerotic plaque . We believe `` loss '' PAI-1 activity may promote pro-atherogenic effect human vasculature thereby define novel atheroprotective effect PAI-1 express normal level human . By use RNA interference achieve PAI-1 gene , hope elucidate mechanistic basis PAI-1 regulation may affect human migration within vasculature .
